original_text: And they have built the high places of Tophet, which is in the valley of the son of Hinnom, to burn their sons and their daughters in the fire; which I commanded them not, neither came it into my heart.
korean_text: 힌놈의 아들 골짜기에 도벳 사당을 건축하고 그들의 자녀들을 불에 살랐나니 내가 명령하지 아니하였고 내 마음에 생각하지도 아니한 일이니라

sentences.original_text: And they have built high places of Tophet,
which is in the valley of the son of Hinnom,
to burn their sons and their daughters in the fire;
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 아들들과 딸들을 불에 태우기 위함이며

sentences.original_text: neither came it into my heart.
